channel.title: CVE Feed for Lunar -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lunar -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-3507|2024-08-01T20:12:07.605Z -- lunar -- lunar
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Lunar software that affects versions 6.0.2 through 6.6.0. This vulnerability allows an attacker to perform a secondary process injection into the Lunar application and abuse those rights to access sensitive user information.

item.title: CVE-2024-3507|2024-06-04T17:32:50.045Z -- lunar -- lunar
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Lunar software that affects versions 6.0.2 through 6.6.0. This vulnerability allows an attacker to perform a secondary process injection into the Lunar application and abuse those rights to access sensitive user information.
